databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.MS_SENIN_ID ,
MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.ZIP_CODE , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.PREFECTURES , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.CITY_TOWN , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.STREET ,
MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.P_ZIP_CODE , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.P_PREFECTURES , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.P_CITY_TOWN , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.P_STREET ,
MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.A_ZIP_CODE , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.A_PREFECTURES , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.A_CITY_TOWN , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.A_STREET ,
MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.REMARKS ,
MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.DELETE_FLAG , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.SEND_FLAG , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.VESSEL_ID , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.DATA_NO , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.USER_KEY , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.RENEW_DATE , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.TS
FROM MS_SENIN_ADDRESS
WHERE MS_SENIN_ADDRESS.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO MS_SENIN_ADDRESS(
MS_SENIN_ID ,
ZIP_CODE , PREFECTURES , CITY_TOWN , STREET ,
P_ZIP_CODE , P_PREFECTURES , P_CITY_TOWN , P_STREET ,
A_ZIP_CODE , A_PREFECTURES , A_CITY_TOWN , A_STREET ,
REMARKS ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES(
:MS_SENIN_ID ,
:ZIP_CODE , :PREFECTURES , :CITY_TOWN , :STREET ,
:P_ZIP_CODE , :P_PREFECTURES , :P_CITY_TOWN , :P_STREET ,
:A_ZIP_CODE , :A_PREFECTURES , :A_CITY_TOWN , :A_STREET ,
:REMARKS ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SENIN_ADDRESS SET
ZIP_CODE = :ZIP_CODE ,PREFECTURES = :PREFECTURES ,CITY_TOWN = :CITY_TOWN ,STREET = :STREET
,P_ZIP_CODE = :P_ZIP_CODE ,P_PREFECTURES = :P_PREFECTURES ,P_CITY_TOWN = :P_CITY_TOWN ,P_STREET = :P_STREET
,A_ZIP_CODE = :A_ZIP_CODE ,A_PREFECTURES = :A_PREFECTURES ,A_CITY_TOWN = :A_CITY_TOWN ,A_STREET = :A_STREET
,REMARKS = :REMARKS
,DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG ,SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG ,VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID ,DATA_NO = :DATA_NO ,USER_KEY = :USER_KEY ,RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE ,RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID ,TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID AND TS = :TS
